Interface ConfigurationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

    public ConfigurationService

    Created by Shynixn 2018.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean containsValue(java.lang.String path)
      Checks if the given path contains a value.
      <C> C findValue(java.lang.String path)
      Tries to load the config value from the given path. Throws a IllegalArgumentException if the path could not be correctly loaded.
      java.nio.file.Path getApplicationDir()
      Gets the path to the folder where the application is allowed to store save data.
      java.io.InputStream openResource(java.lang.String name)
      Opens an inputStream to the given resource name.
      void reload()
      Reloads the config.
